column1: The Stricken Anvil was the emblem of the House of the Hammer of Wrath
column2: a Twelve Houses of the Gondothlim of Gondolin under Rog.  It was emblazoned upon their shields: a hammer striking an anvil
column3: sending sparks up.  The larger part of that House were smiths
